Structs

The following structs are available globally.

  • Entity

    An entity object contains information about a specific entity in the input text. An entity is a person, location, or event that is referred to by one or more mentions.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public struct Entity: JSONDecodable
  • ReferencingMentions

    A mention that references an identity.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public struct ReferencingMentions: JSONDecodable
  • Mention

    A Mention object contains annotations about a word or phrase that refers to an actual thing, or entity, such as a person or location.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public struct Mention: JSONDecodable
  • Sentence

    Contains the analysis of an input sentence. Produced by the Relationship Extraction service.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public struct Sentence: JSONDecodable
  • Token

    A Token object provides more information about a specific token (word or punctuation) in the sentence.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public struct Token: JSONDecodable
  • Document

    An analysis of the input text, produced by the Relationship Extraction service.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public struct Document: JSONDecodable
  • Relations

    Describes the relationships that exist between entities in the text.
